venue.name: Blackstone River Bikeway - John Street Parking Area

item.description:
Ok, here is the updated meet-up details:

We'll meet at the John Street Parking lot along the Blackstone River Bikeway (visit the numerous sites online - they're helpful with directions!).

John St. Parking
From Route 146

Take exit for Route 123 Breakneck Hill Road
Follow Route 123. It will become Great Road, then Front St. and eventually John St.
Parking is north of MM7.5 on the bikeway
There is limited parking at this location

We'll meet at the parking lot and do an 'out-and-back' ride (between 10-20 miles round trip depending on the group's comfort level. Individuals can always add another loop to up their mileage). I'll be there with a green jersey, red bike and red helmet.

There's a great online Bikeway Guide that you can download and reference complete with mile markers and points of interest.
item.name: Blackstone River Bikeway
